de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout

Class AbstractArithmetics

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.AbstractArithmetics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Arithmetics
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhoneArithmetics, TabletArithmetics

    public abstract class AbstractArithmetics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Arithmetics
    An abstract base class for all classes, which provide methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's tabs.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.Arithmetics

        Arithmetics.Axis

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractArithmetics(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
      Creates a new class, which provides methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's tabs.

      Animates the position of an item on a specific axis.

      Returns the scale of an item, depending on its margin.
      float getTabContainerSize(Arithmetics.Axis axis)
      Returns the size of the container, which contains the tab switcher's tabs, on a specific axis.

      • AbstractArithmetics

        public AbstractArithmetics(@NonNull
                           TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
        Creates a new class, which provides methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's tabs.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The tab switcher, the arithmetics should be calculated for, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null

      • getTabSwitcher

        @NonNull
protected final TabSwitcher getTabSwitcher()
        Returns the tab switcher, the arithmetics are calculated for.
        Returns:

      • getTabContainerSize

        public final float getTabContainerSize(@NonNull
                                       Arithmetics.Axis axis)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Returns the size of the container, which contains the tab switcher's tabs, on a specific axis. By default, the padding and the size of the toolbars are included.
        Specified by:
        getTabContainerSize in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis as a value of the enum Arithmetics.Axis. The axis may not be null
        Returns:
        The size of the container, which contains the tab switcher's tabs, on the given axis as a Float value

      • animatePosition

        public final void animatePosition(@NonNull
                                  Arithmetics.Axis axis,
                                  @NonNull
                                  android.view.ViewPropertyAnimator animator,
                                  @NonNull
                                  AbstractItem item,
                                  float position)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Animates the position of an item on a specific axis. By default, the item's padding is not taken into account.
        Specified by:
        animatePosition in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis as a value of the enum Arithmetics.Axis. The axis may not be null
        animator - The animator, which should be used to animate the position, as an instance of the class ViewPropertyAnimator. The animator may not be null
        item - The item, whose position should be animated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        position - The position, which should be set by the animation, as a Float value

      • getScale

        public final float getScale(@NonNull
                            AbstractItem item)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Returns the scale of an item, depending on its margin. By default, the item's padding is not taken into account.
        Specified by:
        getScale in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        item - The item, whose scale should be returned, as an instance of the class AbstractItem. The item may not be null
        Returns:
        The scale of the given item as a Float value
